name: R5-NamingSystem-R4-NamingSystem
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NamingSystem into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem`

element.display: When the NamingSystem was approved by publisher

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.contact`
R5 `NamingSystem.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.contained`
R5 `NamingSystem.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the naming system

target.display: Natural language description of the naming system
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.description`

element.display: When the NamingSystem is expected to be used
For testing purposes, not real usage

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `NamingSystem.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `NamingSystem.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.id`

element.display: Additional identifier for the naming system (business identifier)
A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for naming system (if applicable)

target.display: Intended jurisdiction for naming system (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.jurisdiction`

R5 `NamingSystem.kind` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.kind` - kind has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `NamingSystem.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `NamingSystem.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: When the NamingSystem was last reviewed by the publisher

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.meta`

R5 `NamingSystem.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `NamingSystem.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for this naming system (computer friendly)

target.display: Name for this naming system (computer friendly)
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.name`

element.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.publisher`

element.display: Why this naming system is defined

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.responsible` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.responsible`

R5 `NamingSystem.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.text`

element.display: Title for this naming system (human friendly)
e.g. driver,  provider,  patient, bank etc

target.display: e.g. driver,  provider,  patient, bank etc.
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `NamingSystem.type` - type changed the binding strength from Preferred to Extensible
R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId`
R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.comment` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.comment`

R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.period`

element.display: Is this the id that should be used for this type

target.display: Is this the id that should be used for this type
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.preferred` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.preferred`

element.display: oid | uuid | uri | iri-stem | v2csmnemonic | other

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.value` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.value`

element.display: Canonical identifier for this naming system, represented as a URI (globally unique)

target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.usage` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.usage`

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R5 `NamingSystem.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R4 `NamingSystem.useContext`

element.display: Business version of the naming system
